mapper.select: SELECT coupon_id, coupon_name, coupon_dc_pct, to_char(coupon_start_ts, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_char(coupon_end_ts, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), coupon_explan FROM t_coupon WHERE coupon_visible = '0' AND coupon_end_ts > current_date OR coupon_end_ts IS NULL

SELECT c.coupon_id, coupon_name, coupon_dc_pct, to_char(coupon_start_ts, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_char(coupon_end_ts, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), coupon_explan FROM t_coupon c, t_coupon_usage t WHERE c.coupon_id = t.coupon_id AND user_id = #{ userId } AND (coupon_end_ts > current_date OR coupon_end_ts IS NULL) AND coupon_used = 'N'
